price: 42. Tango ayakaki balobaki naye ete (mokonzi mwasi wana): Boye oyo ngwende nayo te? Azongisaki ete ezali lokola yango! (Alobi Suleyman): Tozuaki boyebi liboso naye mpe tomisokie (tokomi bamizilima).
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ قِيلَ أَهَٰكَذَا عَرۡشُكِۖ قَالَتۡ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلۡعِلۡمَ مِن قَبۡلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāat qīla ahākadhā ʿarshuki qālat ka-annahu huwa waūtīnā al-ʿil'ma min qablihā wakunnā mus'limīna
